function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased alcohol consumption during lockdown","Impact":"Exacerbation of health issues and risk of addiction","Mitigation":"Promote healthy coping mechanisms and provide support for individuals at risk","Technologies":"Telemedicine for remote counseling and support","People":"People with a history of excessive alcohol consumption","Owner":"Health organizations and support groups"},{"Description":"Impact of displacement pressure on health-harming behaviors","Impact":"Risk of increased harmful drinking and emotional eating","Mitigation":"Address systemic discrimination and provide social support to affected individuals","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms for support and awareness","People":"Those affected by displacement pressure","Owner":"Community organizations and advocacy groups"},{"Description":"Shift towards home-based health harming behaviors","Impact":"Increased burden of disease caused by Non-Communicable Diseases (NCDs)","Mitigation":"Promote public health education and awareness on the risks of home-based health harming behaviors","Technologies":"Digital health education platforms and targeted awareness campaigns","People":"General population","Owner":"Public health authorities and educational institutions"}]}
